channel.title: Naya! ~~Let us travel not where our minds desire but, where our hearts wander~
channel.description:
[center][b]Naya![/b][/center] What is Naya? Naya is a *NEW* Runescape Private Server, attempting to bring amazing! content to Private Servers!
Who am I? I am Brent, Server owner, I strive my best to work with the TrisidiaXV3 Source code, and, have stripped it down to...next to null, I have completely rebuilt some of the coding, and, although very new to Java Programming and Runescape Private Servers in general, believe, I am doing a good job!
So, What do I want? That's where you guys come in, I am looking to produce an AMAZING! Runescape Private Server, unfortunately, I don't have all the answers to my Programming questions, nor, the knowledge *yet*, to do what I want, I am looking to get a team of Developers! working together to produce the server.
Well...That's good and all...but, what have you done? Well! since I am new to Runescape Private Servers, I am not entirely sure what's considered *good*, to sprout about...but, so far...
I have successfully completed the following: Re-Written Dialogues - Still working on producing dialogues for custom quests! Started the base to an ALL new minigame! re-written out commands completely wiped any exsisting NPC, Item Models, ItemID's and NPC Spawn data Producing CUSTOM! NPC's and Items (I'm not much the modeler :P)
What am I working on? Completing the custom Quests Completing the custom Minigame Implement custom NPC and Items
So...Can we see some of it? Sure!, Below are some pictures :) Login: http://gyazo.com/a1afe89cfb11ddd8fb9c2280ee0bbcdc
Home http://gyazo.com/f80fd7b739feeea0ad510289a8a1725c
Donor Zone http://gyazo.com/d4736092951f9bfeabff3dd5ccf607e4
Donator Shop http://gyazo.com/7e0be4effb2af5aefba641fcdde08a43
Redeemable Shop! http://gyazo.com/e0488ee591758ade077615d08d2609ca
If you are interested in helping Naya! grow and become a great server! please! reply to this topic, or, add me on skype! Skype: InBrent
I realise the server isn't in the best of, "shape" but, one can only grow once started!
So please! don't discourage! I am trying, this is my first project!

[center]Naya![/center]
What is Naya?
Naya is a NEW Runescape Private Server, attempting to bring amazing! content to Private Servers!

Who am I?
I am Brent, Server owner, I strive my best to work with the TrisidiaXV3 Source code, and, have stripped it down to…next to null, I have completely rebuilt some of the coding, and, although very new to Java Programming and Runescape Private Servers in general, believe, I am doing a good job!
